Name: Garden Galaxy
About the game: In Garden Galaxy you build and arrange your own personalised garden from randomised item drops, pulled from an enormous selection of different items and decorations. No two gardens are the same! When at the mercy of chance, every garden you create will be unique and evolve with every new item from the pot. Stack the odds in your favour with special items to increase the chances of getting the items you want or even stop them from appearing! üå± Spend your coins to discover new plants, furniture, decorations & more. üìï Fill your collection with items from themed sets. üßπ Stay organised by storing or selling your items. ‚òÅÔ∏è Customise your garden with different lighting, effects & backgrounds. ‚ú® Mysterious visitors will bring you coins to spend. ‚è≥ Visitors will arrive even when idle so you can leave the game on in the background.
